## LogLevel enum

Error severity of a log, i.e. whether a log event is due to an exception, warning, or just an info message. See [ILogEvent](./jabra-js.ilogevent.md) for more information.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum LogLevel 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ERROR | <code>&quot;error&quot;</code> | Used when the reason for the log event can be regarded as an error. |
|  INFO | <code>&quot;info&quot;</code> | Used to log messages related to normal execution. |
|  WARNING | <code>&quot;warning&quot;</code> | Used when the user is warned that something might have gone wrong (but not necessarily). |
